name: Chonk
description: CHONK is a game changing DEFI innovation that merges NFTS and an ERC-20 token into one cohesive ecosystem. Our bidirectional NFT swap system seamlessly merges the NFT and token markets, creating a hyper deflationary NFT with unique game theory dynamics. Addressing the liquidity challenge in the NFT realm head-on, we've introduced a solution that distinguishes us in the DEFI world. At CHONK, we're not only advancing DeFi, we're shaping the future of NFTs.
